title: Private Loft 1 Bedroom/1 Bath for Rent!!!
posting_body: ['I am a friendly, tidy, full-time teacher looking for another full-time young professional to rent a private lofted floor in Arbor Pointe Condominiums in Arvada, Colorado above the main floor where I live full time.', "Space consists of one 11' x 14' unfurnished bedroom, private bathroom with shower, and fairly large walk in closet!", 'Floor also has a separate private exterior entrance leading right into the bedroom, apart from the main front door to the shared living room below.', 'Perfect for individuals who like their privacy and quiet time behind closed doors with the flexibility of shared/friendly space below.', 'The bedroom has several outlets, TV/internet hook ups, and central heating and cooling.', "The room also has lots of light and a view of the Rocky Mountains, you can't get any better than that!", "The bathroom is knowingly in need of general upgrades and has the potential for said upgrades during the lease to be signed but know that this is not guaranteed and completely reliant on homeowner's available finances.", 'This rental comes with a reserved parking space.', 'First floor contains common living space to be shared of the furnished living room with a huge wood burning fireplace, furnished dining room, small patio with grill, and the kitchen with all necessary appliances including dishes, utensils, and cookware.', 'Brand new floors installed as of May 22nd 2017!', '(Additional storage space is unavailable, individuals with personal living room and dining room furniture will need to find private storage).', 'Shared washer/dryer is available on the main floor within the condo.', 'No going far for clean clothes!', 'Oh, did I mention this complex has an outdoor swimming pool as well?!!', ': )', 'Perfect for the hot summer months!', 'This condominium contains pets!', 'I have two very sweet and lovable cats who live on the first floor with me, as well as a caged sugar glider.', 'No pets disturb the upstairs resident, they are allowed only on first floor.', 'Please no additional pets!', 'This home is all set : )', 'I am a responsible, understanding, orderly individual who most definitely does not live the party life anymore!', 'I love a quiet evening at home cooking dinner and watching a good movie while having some friends over on occasion on weekends.', 'Since I teach during the week I am not typically indulging in late evenings as I have early mornings.', 'I am most eager to find an individual who appreciates the same lifestyle as myself and wants to share in it!', 'Please also know that this is not a 420 friendly home as I am sensitive to the smell.', 'It is also important to me that interested individuals are fully COVID vaccinated.', 'Interested individuals please email!', '12 month lease available only, unfortunately no month by month available.', 'Rent and split energy bill are the only fees.', 'All others (internet, water/trash, HOA) are covered in rental cost : ) $400 deposit prior to move in.', 'Thank you!']
